Package com.sun.enterprise.module.maven

Class Summary
AptCompiler Compiler for APT.
CompilerMojo Compiles application sources
CompositeAnnotationProcessorFactory AnnotationProcessorFactory that aggregates multiple AnnotationProcessorFactorys.
DependencyAnalyserMojo Does static analysis of classes in a module to ensure that module dependency is correctly set up.
HK2CompileMojo Replacement of the default javac mojo that uses APT, so that we can not only compile source code but also generate HK2 related metadata at the same time.
HK2GenerateMojo Generates a consolidated OSGI bundle with a consolidated HK2 header
HK2TestCompileMojo  
MavenProjectRepository Repository implementation that loads modules from the transitive dependencies set in a MavenProject.
OSGiPackager Prepares OSGi manifest entries in MavenArchiveConfiguration.
OsgiVersionMojo Converts the project version into the OSGi format and set that to "project.osgi.version" property.
PackageAnalyserMojo Analyses bundle manifest entries in a repository and generates various statistics like: no.
PackageMojo Creates a jar with a special manifest entry.
Packager Prepares manifest entries in MavenArchiveConfiguration.
Processor Data-binding bean to represent an artifact.
RunMojo Launches the module system by using all the dependencies as modules.
ScriptCreatorMojo A Rudimentary Mojo to create scripts for Windows and non-Windows Platforms, based on an intuitive file in a form similar to registry file.
TokenListBuilder  
 

Exception Summary
IOException2  
 

Error Summary
ServiceConfigurationError Error thrown when something goes wrong while looking up service providers.
